original_title: Не заходьте ввечері в бар, не прочитавши про нього відгук
overview: By the will of circumstances, pursuing for the first time a good goal in his life, drug trafficker Taras finds himself in not a friendliest town. Locals play him a dirty trick, but there's one who wants to help him out. However, he has a price to pay.
title: Don't Enter a Bar with Bad Reviews
